articles.author: Christopher Carbone
articles.title: DNA from fossils unearthed in southern China suggest Native Americans have East Asian roots - Daily Mail
articles.description: DNA from ancient fossils in southern China has revealed that Native Americans may have roots in East Asia.
articles.content:
DNA from ancient fossils in southern China has revealed that Native Americans may have roots in East Asia.
Scientists compared the genetic information of the Late Pleistocene era fossils to those fr… [+4859 chars]
